house_listing.house_description: Spectacular, custom blt brick home on privatepark like 1 acre parcel. 2 story foyer w/marble& glass block stairway. GR w/shelf lighting,wet bar. Bleached cabs in kit. Nook has vaultedbleached oak ceiling. Mstr ste w/sitting rm & FP
